txt.en: The presence of the Ruthless Dead has had a curious effect on the Ruins of Ethillorn.
The Ruins of Ethillorn have become host to the Ruthless Dead.\n\nReach the Ruins of Ethillorn, south of Linhir.

The presence of the Ruthless Dead is having a foul influence on the Ruins of Ethillorn.

In particular, you notice some relics appear to be saturated with unnatural power.

It would be safest to destroy them.
Hopefully this action will diminish the powers of the Ruthless Dead, but only time will tell.
Strange items within the ruins of Ethillorn have become possessed of an unseemly power.\n\nDestroy corrupted relics in the Ruins of Ethillorn, south of Linhir.
Discover the camp of the Ruins of Ethillorn
